Chapter.Title: Practice Exercise 5-6 Solution
Chapter.Data:
from ScienceFacts import ScienceFacts
# create an object of ScienceFacts called science science = ScienceFacts()
# get the g-force in a roller coaster using method g_forces roller_coaster_gforce = science.g_forces('Roller coaster')
# get the g-force in a roller coaster using method g_forces elevator_gforce = science.g_forces('free fall elevator')
# compare the g-forces and display the name of the object with greater force if roller_coaster_gforce > elevator_gforce: print 'Roller coaster' else: print 'Elevator'
